meanings.definition: A person who is superior to or surpasses ordinary humans.
meanings.sent1: The overman in the story had incredible strength and intelligence.
meanings.sent2: The superhero was considered an overman because of his extraordinary powers.
meanings.sent3: The overman at the competition amazed everyone with his exceptional skills.
meanings.sent4: She was like an overman in the office, always completing tasks with ease.
meanings.sent5: The overman stood out in the crowd with his remarkable abilities.

meanings.definition: To surpass or exceed in ability or achievement.
meanings.sent1: He managed to overman his opponent in the final match.
meanings.sent2: She hoped to overman her previous record in the upcoming race.
meanings.sent3: The team tried to overman their rivals by practicing extra hard.
meanings.sent4: The student was determined to overman the highest score in the class.
meanings.sent5: With hard work and dedication, he was able to overman all obstacles in his way.
